tool.name: SAGA.shapes_grid.9
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False output_data_MINIMA $output_data_MINIMA output_data_MAXIMA $output_data_MAXIMA name SAGA.shapes_grid.9 GRID $GRID IDENTITY $IDENTITY ABSOLUTE $ABSOLUTE BOUNDARY $BOUNDARY prefer $prefer response $response outputType_MINIMA $OutputSection_MINIMA.outputType_MINIMA transmissionMode_MINIMA $OutputSection_MINIMA.transmissionMode_MINIMA outputType_MAXIMA $OutputSection_MAXIMA.outputType_MAXIMA transmissionMode_MAXIMA $OutputSection_MAXIMA.transmissionMode_MAXIMA

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: IDENTITY
param.label: Identical Values
param.help: If set, neighbour cells with the same value as the center cell are interpreted to be lower for minima and higher for maxima identification.

param.name: ABSOLUTE
param.label: Absolute
param.help: If set, only the grid's absolute maximum/minimum point is returned.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_MINIMA
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MINIMA
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_MAXIMA
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MAXIMA
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Extracts local grid value minima and maxima of to vector points.
